description:
In both nova stable/diablo and develop

Environment: verbose logging on

when running euca-add-keypair (uses the EC2 API function: CreateKeyPair), the private key is written to nova-api.log
title: EC2 API CreateKeyPair writes private key to log in verbose mode

comments.content:
In both nova stable/diablo and develop

Environment: verbose logging on

when running euca-add-keypair (uses the EC2 API function: CreateKeyPair), the private key is written to nova-api.log
